dialogue.content: I'm trying to drink more water but I keep forgetting.
When is it hardest to remember-mornings, afternoons, or evenings?
During busy afternoons. I look up and hours have passed.
Got it. Do you prefer reminders, or setting a simple rule for yourself?
Reminders are fine, I just don't want them every five minutes.
Understood. Any reason you're focusing on hydration right now?
I had a scare before and don't want a repeat.
Okay. We'll keep it simple and realistic for your afternoons.
If I could hit a steady target without thinking about it all day, I'd be happy.
